Text: Yeah tnx but why not seed???

It is being seeded.  It's just reporting zero seeds now because they're still doing work on TPB tracker.  Right now I'm only seeding with 75 peers, and it's now at 89% availability.  Almost done...  I hope the people at TPB get the reporting of seeders/leechers to be accurate.  As anyone can easily tell, the numbers reported on any TPB torrent for seeders/leechers is about one tenth of its actual number; sometimes just reporting a zero for the newest ones.  Besides that one issue, TPB is the ideal, torrent community.
